alignat:
\begin{alignat}{2}
\label{eq:fieldstrengths2}
  G & = 4 \partial C + 6 F^{m} B_{m}\, , & \qquad
  F^{m} & = 2\partial A^{m} -\chi_{np}{}^{m}A^{n}A^{p}\, , \notag \\
  H_{m} & = 3{\cal D} B_{m} + 3 \epsilon_{mnp} F^{n} V^p\, , & 
  \tilde{F}^m & = 2{\cal D} V^m - \epsilon^{mnp} f_{np}{}^{q} B_{q}\, ,
\
